data.title: Augusta Aikido Club
data.meta_description: Augusta Aikido Club location, schedule, fees, and instructors.
data.text:
Parking is at the rear of the building. Enter through the rightmost door as you face the rear of the building. Classes are held in the classrooms at the front of the building. When you enter the building, proceed to the end of the hallway and turn left. The classrooms are through the second and third doors on the right after the left turn. The building may not be open until approximately ten minutes before the scheduled class times shown below.

Please note: Club activities at the synagogue are limited to the hours shown below. Synagogue personnel have only limited information about our program. If you are interested, please contact the club directly (there is an e-mail link at the bottom of the page) or visit us during a scheduled class.

Because of synagogue security concerns it is no longer possible to leave the building unlocked during our classes; if you wish to visit a class, use the button to the left of the door to request entrance.
